column2: which was about six two-bite-sized pieces of very delicately grilled arctic char with the skin on
column3: with crispy brocollini and cherry tomatoes. This was followed by the tomorokoshi congee. Now unlike normal congee which is made with rice
column4: this one was made with grits
column7: and a couple of unidentified veggies and a perfectly poached egg. Texas meets Japan
